articles.author: Adele Ankers-Range
articles.title: Daniel Radcliffe and Other Harry Potter Stars Pay Tribute to the 'Brilliant' Michael Gambon - IGN
articles.description: Harry Potter stars Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, and Emma Watson are among those who have paid tribute to Sir Michael Gambon after his death aged 82.
articles.content:
Harry Potter stars Daniel Radcliffe, Rupert Grint, and Emma Watson are among those who have paid tribute to Sir Michael Gambon after his death aged 82.
